page.title: 09EVENTS IN COITY
page.content: We are fortunate in Coity to have a castle and an ancient church. Many of the events in Coity use these buildings. Once a year we have a village fete, this is held in the castle grounds. Stalls are put up and these sell many things like cakes and plants. There are many games and we pay to roll balls and throw things and hope to win a prize. We throw at coconuts and one year we threw wellingtons. We have a fancy dress parade and starts at the school and arrives at the castle at 2.p.m. In the evening there is a Barn Dance. The school holds certain events. We have Sports Day and It's a Knock Out Competition. The parents hold a social evening in the school. The church holds fetes and the curate held it in his garden one year.
